content:
Trying to update cedar-lean to Lean 4.21, this line is now failing with the error message extra targets for 'eq.simplify.fun_cases' which is not very helpful/informative. I see from the 4.21 changelog that there were a few changes to fun_cases, but none of the things listed there seem directly the cause here. I tried a few things but none of these change anything (even giving me a different error message):

  • set_option tactic.fun_induction.unfolding false as suggested at one point in the changelog
  • Adding additional , _ after t₂
  • Removing , t₂
  • Removing case-bullets from below (starting at line 678)

Anyone have any idea what happened here / how to make progress?
The recommended way to use these is fun_cases Factory.eq.simplify t₁ t₂ which should hopefully work
Craig Disselkoen has marked this topic as resolved.
